column4: Yes, they are available(I've set the path in kaffeine). And I can work with it at first(over 3 hours).
The totem in hoary is just can't work, for anything. I don't have much choise in linux for mutimedia. I really kaffeine would work again.
Totem does work in hoary a series of g-streamer upgrades have been released yesterday so apt-get update and then apt-get upgrade
Totem only started working for me yesterday :)
